mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs B.P. Goad
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs B.P. Goad Offense: Assault and Battery Victim and Complainant: Alventy Jane Goad Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 02.26.1887 Costs: $7.40 court costs 1year surety of $100 B.P. Goad and A.C. Phillips $100. each Paid Surety
